_header: O glorious virgin and martyr Dorothy
Subjects: saints’ lives; Dorothy, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Dorothy — forty-three 8-line stanzas

CULAdd4122.First Lines:
O Gloryous virgyne & martyr dorotheWhos fader was called
                    dorotheusÞi moder was named theodorethou kepteste þe chaste
                    vn to þi spouse ihesu…
CULAdd4122.Last Lines:
…Cryste graunte vs grace wiþ hem to be feedein þe
                    presence of þe holye trynyte

BLAru168.First Lines:
O glorius virgyne o martir dorothewhos fadir was called
                    dorotheus…
BLAru168.Last Lines:
…Criste graunte vs with hire to fedeIn presence of þe
                    holy Trinite
BLAru168.Attributed Title:
‘Explicit vita dorothee’ (f. 6vb), followed by
                    6-line Latin charm related to Dorothy (ff. 6vb-7ra) and
                    prayer to Dorothy in Latin prose (f. 73)

BLHar5272.First Lines:
O glorious virgyne and mertir dorotheWhos fader called
                    dorotheus…
BLHar5272.Last Lines:
…And cast hit in dyuerse partieThat wilde bestis to hit
                    schulde falleAnd o þer fowlis devowre hit alleBut afore that
                    Theophilus…

Horstmann,  Carl.
